com.cyc

Interface CycApiEntryPoint

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KbApiService, NlApiService, QueryApiService, SessionApiService

    public interface CycApiEntryPoint
    A marker service provider interface (SPI) for Cyc API entrypoints. This represents the primary entry point into a Cyc API (e.g., Session API, KB API, Query API, etc.) and any API which extends it should do so exactly once.

    An API may have multiple services defined, but only the API's CycApiEntryPoint will be loaded, and the primary service may then provide additional services. For example, the KB API's KbApiService provides a number of other KB-related services (AssertionService, KbTermService, etc.) To simplify service loading, CycApiEntryPoints may have methods which accept a class that extends CycServicesLoader to provide access to whatever service loader methods would be appropriate; an example of this is QueryApiService.getQueryExplanationFactoryServices(com.cyc.CoreServicesLoader).

    Note that a CycApiEntryPoint may not be directly exposed to the calling application. Although this is possible, method calls to a CycApiEntryPoint are often made through wrapper methods on Cyc, and/or via static interface methods.
